title: Absolute Joke, Scam Artists - stay clear

review:
I downloaded the Coinbase app around a week ago without checking the reviews or knowing much about crypto coin investing/trading but wanted to get in on the hype. 

The app is very easy to use and the fee‚Äôs seem ok only because I haven‚Äôt used other exchanges/wallets to compare. I know some UK banks don‚Äôt allow crypto withdrawals but mine does and in less than a week I have traded making decent profit. 

The fee‚Äôs are taken when selling to your FIAT wallet and not on converting or withdrawing to your verified bank account which needs a ¬£2 deposit to set up. I have stayed well away from using paypal at all costs but have deposited into coinbase from my credit card and bank account. 

All the problems seem to be around bitcoin which I bought to hold but all the rest of the alt coins have been fine when buying and selling especially during highs or lows. 

My mobile Coinbase app works great with Koinly which is a tax software to help keep track of wallet transactions that I need for the HMRC. I needed the software quickly when I realised I was trading much more than just an investment for the long term. Plus the tax on crypto profit isn‚Äôt that simple to track if you trade a lot. 

This app has been great so far but do your own due diligence. I hope this helps.

title: Frustrating scam

review:
You can‚Äôt make money from trading via coinbase unless the fluctuation of your crypto has increased by atleast 10 percent. If your like me and trying to profit between 2-10 percent per conversion instead of withdrawing your money to avoid fees, Coinbase will almost certainly convert your currency at a loss of even though they say no fee. They justify this buy saying there is a 200 basis point to account for the offer they honour you which basically means you will be paying 2% to them every time u exchange at the least and further more you can receive even less that they claim accounts for slippage.

I checked my value at the time of my transactions and even if I have been successful by the time my selected crypto has increased by ten percent I just start to break even. 

In my opinion this is a total abuse of my good faith as a customer and would only recommend storing on coinbase and maybe long term trading.
title: It‚Äôs bad for everyday trading but ok for storing I guess

review:
I am not one for writing reviews but I feel very strongly about this and hope whoever reads my review will take heed and look elsewhere. 
It seems that no matter how many hoops you jump through (verifications) for Coinbase, they restrict your ability to buy, sell or transfer crypto as they please for no valid reason. 
I joined Coinbase today and did all that was required of me to be verified (to the top level) to now be in a position where I have a considerable amount of BTC on their platform and have no access to it. Makes me wonder after reading similar stories if this is how Coinbase makes money. Take our funds and keep them for a while and then give us back after making some money. 
So anyway, like everyone else I‚Äôm awaiting a response from Customer Services, we‚Äôll see how that goes. 
Funny thing is I read all the negative reviews but because I saw a few positive ones I thought I‚Äôd try Coinbase. Don‚Äôt get get caught out like I did. Go elsewhere. 
If Coinbase sort me out then I‚Äôll give credit where credit is due, and if not then I‚Äôll be back in here to report likewise.

*** Update***
What looks like a generic email was received on Sunday 23 August 2020 at 04:06 am. The email states that my case has been sent to a specialist and I should get a response in 5-7 business days or maybe longer. 
So a good amount of BTC is sat on coinbase platform and I am having to wait even though as I said before I‚Äôve done everything asked of me.
title: Please consider all the negative reviews

review: Coinbase has been nothing but good to me whilst I have been a user. I have no problems using this platform and have been able to sell, convert and send with ease. One thing that I am disappointed in is the de-listing of XRP. I can‚Äôt fathom how coins like Dogecoin and Shiba Inu are able to be listed and a coin like XRP cannot. I understand that the company Ripple are currently being sued by the SEC, but a little more communication from coinbase to state why they have de-listed and when they are going to re-list (if this is the case) would provide us, the users who pay fees to coinbase, a little more clarity and assurance abojt the asset we hold.

review:
Coinbase on the Apple App Store is a standout application for anyone delving into the world of cryptocurrency. Its user interface is exceptionally intuitive, making it accessible even for beginners. The app's design is sleek and responsive, ensuring a smooth experience every time you use it.

What truly sets Coinbase apart is its 'easy cash-out' feature. This functionality is a game-changer, allowing users to effortlessly convert their cryptocurrencies into cash and transfer it to their bank account quickly and securely. The process is so streamlined that it feels like an extension of your regular banking app, but with the added benefit of cryptocurrency management.

Additionally, the app's security features are top-notch, providing peace of mind in an industry where security is paramount. Coinbase's regular updates and improvements also show their commitment to providing a top-quality experience for its users.

Overall, Coinbase is a must-have app for anyone interested in cryptocurrencies, offering a perfect blend of ease, security, and functionality. It‚Äôs a shining example of how finance and technology can come together seamlessly in the app world."
title: Coinbase: A Stellar App for Cryptocurrency Management

review:
Based in London and buy in GBP. Pretty steep FX which I understand (as all scaleups trying to turn profitable not just revenue generator ) BUT they don‚Äôt seem to know where their positioning; trading (ie Robinhoods of this world) vs investing (AJBell et all), as they like to appear as the latter but are really much more of the former. 

Evidence? Well, what is the point of showing portfolio today without allowing you to see option of what it was when you bought, either in USD or GBP terms? Well because they want you to
day trade and not think longe term. That‚Äôs one of many (eg chart detailing) small features the head of product has been tasked with to focus on growth / immediate traction as opposed to loyalty. Started here and like it, but unless it cater to more serious traders with more than pocket change to play with, will move elsewhere.

Have searched through their website and my emails and still have not found an email for help. Have managed to find something online through someone else but have not had a response. Other people who have had this problem have also said they have had to wait and still received no reply. YOU CANNOT SELL ON THIS APP. It is very worrying that this is not made clearer to UK residents before you download and they are still allowed to continue. DO NOT DOWNLOAD

review:
My initial identification verification was easy and fast and I was able to trade. Since my first trade I have tried for days to verify my identity again as I am unable to trade until it is again. I have left my small initial trade but withdrew all my other funds as I couldn‚Äôt trade at all. 
It‚Äôs a pity as the crypto options are great and easy to track etc, but it‚Äôs all pointless if I can‚Äôt use or trade in them. As usual it‚Äôs impossible to get a person to assist and all help is auto response and generated emails that don‚Äôt solve my problem. I have tried for days to get this resolved. 
App is subject to crash and website locked and fails at sings of any heavy traffic. Very disappointed as such great potential but as a trading platform pointless if you can‚Äôt trade. Will try another application instead. So frustrating.

review:

I opened an account and invested money which was fine. However when I wanted to withdraw or change my investment, my account was locked ‚Äúunder review‚Äù which now means my money is stuck in my investment which I can see is going down in value but can‚Äôt access to withdraw. Save your money and invest using another crypto app!! Unless you want to loose your hard earned money!

review:
I downloaded both Coinbase and Coinbase Pro a week ago, and signed up for a Coinbase account.  I answered all of the questions, and submitted my UK driving licence - yet my account is STILL under review.  My partner signed up a couple of days after me, and was verified relatively quickly.  Why did the same not happen for me?  How long am I supposed to carry on waiting?!? 

I contacted Coinbase support, and their email response said that my account was ‚Äústill under review‚Äù and that ‚Äúdue to a high number of requests, account reviews are taking longer than usual but our team is working hard to get to yours.‚Äù  What a joke.

Out of frustration of not being able to trade on Coinbase, I have signed up to Binance.  They verified me within a couple of hours - no problems whatsoever.  I am extremely disappointed by the poor customer service offered by Coinbase, not to mention the complete waste of my time.  Utter rubbish.

I‚Äôve liked coinbase since I first signed up, it‚Äôs an app on my iPhone, not sure if I get all the functionality coinbase has to offer, but the ease of buys and sells is fantastic, and I‚Äôve noticed fees have become cheaper making regular moving easer and safer.

Better charts would be fantastic and more news feeds too. Ultimately I love the site, I signed up to LBX (as I‚Äôm English) and they offered xrp, what a nightmare of a palaver that sight is, so I‚Äôve abandoned it to focus here on coinbase.

review:
I transferred Ethereum from my MetaMask wallet to the coinbase wallet address that was shown when I clicked ‚Äúreceive‚Äù on my coinbase app‚Ä¶ as soon as I done this, the transaction was completed on the metamask end, but never showed up in my coinbase account‚Ä¶ 
Contacted ‚Äúsupport‚Äù, spoke to multiple agents and none of them could answer any of my questions as to where my funds were sitting as the transaction had completed. They proceeded to tell me my funds were unretrievable because I apparently sent ethereum to the wallet address of a different type of crypto?! How?! I legitimately only pressed the receive button on the app, as any customer would, and their lack of due diligence to alert customers on the ‚Äúreceive‚Äù page that this can happen is disgraceful. I dread to imagine how many people have been scammed this way? I lost a merely ¬£154 but I needed that money for bills, I feel worse for people who have lost more.

review: Coinbase has quickly went from a 5 star app to 1.  The company appear to suffer from a serious issue when it comes to ID verification - I have been using the app for several months happily, having originally verified ID. Out of the blue I was asked to verify my ID again; it‚Äôs worth noting up to this point I had only bought crypto and not engaged in selling, withdrawals or sending funds. Unfortunately at this junction Coinbase has failed to verify the same ID as it does not match DOB given on account - this is not the case. Many attempts later using different upload methods and forms of ID, my identity is still not verified.  Contacted customer services by email and originally received a canned response, my follow up has remained unanswered for several weeks now.  I now have a restricted account with a considerable amount of money being held hostage.  Coinbase sort this out or I will escalate the matter to the financial services ombudsman.

review:
Almost 4 weeks passed and still unable to use the app despite submitting verification correctly. Raised a ticket online through their site, few days later was told they are investigating, a week or so passed and I chased them up, again told they are still investigating, week later I get a notification via email informing me the issue had been resolved and the ticket closed‚Ä¶checked the app and surprise surprise problem still existed. Raised another ticket and still waiting  for it to be resolved, no response or update from them, but I‚Äôm getting several news emails and notifications informing what I could be doing with Coinbase (annoying)
No other means of contacting Coinbase but via email. Now Coinbase have my personal data and I can‚Äôt even use the service.
Think twice about registering for this app, currently using Kraken and experienced none of these issues.
title: Poor service, don‚Äôt waste your time

review:
I have invested some money on coinbase. It was all very easy to deposit money into coinbase but withdrawing it so far I am finding impossible.
They asked to verify my account which I did by sending a small amount of money to coinbase and they confirmed the receipt of the money. Still unable to withdraw the money. It still ask me to verify the account which I am have already done. 
I tried to get help from their online chat but frustratingly it‚Äôs all automated chat and won‚Äôt be able to answer queries.
I will stay away from coinbase to be honest. I WILL get my money back though even if it means getting legal help. Won‚Äôt let these dodgy companies play with others money. Very very unhappy and unsatisfied. Actually I am more angry towards myself for jumping into using coinbase. At least my reviews may help others.
I am happy to change my opinions if coinbase calls me and helps me with my situation but until then I have no faith.

review: Coinbase has been my trusted platform for buying bitcoins, and I'm thoroughly impressed with their service. The user interface is intuitive, making it easy for even beginners to navigate and purchase cryptocurrencies seamlessly. The transaction process is fast and secure, giving me confidence in every purchase I make. Additionally, their customer support team has been incredibly helpful whenever I've had any questions or issues. Overall, Coinbase is my go-to platform for buying bitcoins, and I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a reliable and user-friendly way to invest in cryptocurrencies

review:
First off you think this is a good company to buy cryptocurancy, but , wait for it, once you want to try and withdraw funds, yep you guessed it, it's almost impossible. With only an automated computer system taking you round in circles till your blue in the face. 

There is no U.K. Based help line , there is a help line available but this is based in America to be precise.......California.

 Don't take my word for it read reviews about this company. 
If your in the U.K., it's like trying to get blood out of a stone. Emailed them over a week ago and still no  response. 

It states on their customer support page, only accepting problems with log in and deposits..... mmmmm that's appropriate isn't it? 
Yep so if you want to withdraw funds, yep no support assistance , so basically your money is stick in crypto land. This is a big problem for people based on the U.K. 

Tones of people the same as my self in the same situation. 

Just to add I was able to deposit funds via my bank (HSBC ) 
I got my bank to send money via the SEPTA verification, to validate my account. 
I sent them copy's of my passport and driving licence.

Met all the regulations, but unable to withdraw funds. 

I am not alone. 
Please , be aware, as when you want you funds out, your guess is as good as mine as to when I'll be able if ever to get them back using " COINBASE ".

I left me feeling discouraged from engaging with the app further and especially from putting my own money into in.

review:
A really good app, incredibly easy to use and set up bank details, withdrawals, trades etc. The app is also improving constantly which is great though the fees for any transaction are a little high

Only issue is with notifications - I don‚Äôt understand why these were edited, I used to be able to set a notification to say when a certain coin was above/below an amount, at which I would be happy to buy/sell. These have been removed and replaced with generic daily notifications that ‚Äúx has gained y% in 24 hours‚Äù at which point it‚Äôs too late or not relevant. This makes things much more difficult to keep an eye on without looking at the app all day. Would love to see this back in the next update
title: Easy to use and improving app

review: It was so easy to make a deposit into the wallets in order to buy the cryptocurrencies but withdrawing wasn't. They make you transfer an international payment in order to "verify" your bank account. When you buy the currencies they up the price more than what shows on the app. They take their own cut when you sell it off. Then even after paying a fee for verification, they take your own money to handle the fee they should be paying to transfer to your account when you withdraw. I am absolutely appalled by these theives with the hidden fees that they do not clearly mention prior to depositing into the wallets. The only reason this app is highly rated is due to the people spamming their codes for $10 off. The customer service does not exist, they will never respond to you. To be honest this whole trading system should be reported as stealing. Never again shall I trust such apps and neither should you. STAY AWAY.
title: Scammers

review: Happy to amend this review if I am proven wrong, however right now I am very concerned about Coinbase. It‚Äôs oh so easy to put money into it via debit or credit card but nigh on impossible to get it out. They say that you need to make a debit to their account (in Estonia) to set up a banking relationship ahead of taking money out (as opposed to letting you withdraw to the same card account that you made the deposit with which most e-wallets do). Says that his will show up within 1-2 days. Well, I made that deposit 7 working days ago and it hasn‚Äôt showed up yet. It also fails to recognise IBAN and SWIFT/BIC account numbers that reputable banks like HSBC UK provide. If you like seeing a nice pretty graph with your investment going up then this is the app for you. If you want to get into a catch-22 cycle with only a Bot to respond to your questions when they fail to let you get any of your money out then this is the app for you!
title: Coinbase needs to up its game

DO NOT RISK THIS HAPPENING TO YOU!!

review:
This app is verging on criminal. They will take your money in seconds however withdrawing that money is beyond complicated. You are forced to jump through hoops and charged commission and fees at every stage. Whatever small profit you may have made is instantly wiped out in fees. I lost a good amount of money. Try contacting the customer services-if they ever reply  they give you some random answer to a question you never asked. If they finally address your concern they make it so unbelievably complicated that you invariably give up. An absolute joke of an app and criminal organisation. Avoid. 

This scam will loose you everything you put into it and more. Do not download you will loose everything you put in.

review: Lots of bad reviews so was very skeptical to use but decided to go by friends advice and set up I followed instructions and account was set up in 15 minutes no pending done my first trade from Binance as my crypto is not supported by Coinbase which hopefully they will soon (Avax) had no problems at all little expensive swapping USDT to GBP 26 pounds on a 2500 dollar trade. Anyway all went through in mins 10 tops money in my account no problems whatsoever only bug bear Coinbase doesn‚Äôt support loads of crypto and fees to transfer a little expensive but still no issues whatsoever 10/10 will defo use again when I sell the bulk of my coins

review:
For argument‚Äôs sake, let‚Äôs say my balance is $1,000 USD. If I change this to GBP my balance says ¬£1,000. If I change it to EUR my balance still says ‚Ç¨1,000. This is really frustrating because I don‚Äôt know what my actual balance is‚Ä¶

The help page is really poor. You can only select your issue from a list of drop downs but none of them apply to the above, so how can I report the problem? The option for ‚Äòother‚Äô then forces me to pick the issue of accessing a deceased person‚Äôs account, which clearly isn‚Äôt correct. Why can‚Äôt there be a generic ‚Äòother‚Äô problem? Or even an email address for me to contact them?

Those issues aside, I find the interface much easier to use than other crypto apps which have too much information on screen.
title: Currency conversion not working. Poor help page.

review: I have been waiting over 2 months for my account to be verified. Within 24 hours they verified me ONLY to allow me to purchase. Then as I wanted to trade and sell it kept saying account not verified. I have submitted so many requests for it to be dealt with and received nothing but an automated email stating that they are trying to deal with the issue. After that I receive an email to say my query has been dealt with and closed but NOTHING has changed. Awful app and awful customer service, beware people before you use this app. Worst customer service ever, I have made a complaint and waiting for a reply from that, if not resolved I will take it to the financial ombudsman to be dealt with. I feel like I have been robbed, I put quite a lot of money initially and now it‚Äôs stuck in their app not allowing me to do anything with my own money. BEWARE PEOPLE

review: Coinbase is the gold standard in cryptocurrency exchanges, and for good reason! Their user-friendly platform makes buying, selling, and trading digital assets a breeze, even for beginners. With a wide range of cryptocurrencies available and seamless integration with fiat currencies, Coinbase offers unparalleled accessibility and convenience. The security measures in place give me peace of mind knowing my assets are safe, and their responsive customer support team is always there to assist whenever needed. Whether you're a seasoned trader or just dipping your toes into the world of crypto, Coinbase is the perfect platform to start your journey.
title: Coinbase is the perfect platform to start your journey

review:
I downloaded this app about 2 months ago after submitting proof of id it work on pc or laptop not on my iphone. I send  message on there page and received response after 2 weeks they are looking in to it. Then i have waited 1 week and send another message received reply problem is solved. I checked app still not working. I sent them message again they have asked about some more details of problem i provided them iphone model and ios version app version etc . I received reply after few days problem is solved. I tried app it still not work same error message when open app show we are aware of this problem and trying to fix it. Do not worry your funds are safe. 
It is unexceptionable customer service from this well known app. I have given up and delete this app.
title: Mobile App not working rubbish customer service

review:
They have a very sketchy business structure for English customers. Depositing is fine, they charge you a fee, about 4%, to deposit using a debit card which is fine. But once you come to wanting to withdraw, that‚Äôs where it all becomes very dodgy. Apparently this, the largest bitcoin broker, only allows you to deposit to a verified bank account, which means you have to send a SEPA transfer to them to verify (which with Santander has a ¬£19 charge). They don‚Äôt offer PayPal or withdrawals using debit cards. So basically they‚Äôve very quick to take your money and charge you for the pleasure. But make it as hard and expensive as possible to get your money back.

Also, their customer service is awful, they don‚Äôt have a uk number to call so good luck incurring further costs trying to contact them, and their email support is terrible and takes forever to respond. 

If you do go through with the sepa transfer (cause hell, I‚Äôve got no other way to get my money back than spend more money), myself and loads of other are told that our transfer ‚Äúfailed‚Äù but they can verify it manually. Seems a little coincidental that so many payments fail but they‚Äôre still able to verify it manually.

Long story short, borderline fraudulent withdrawal process DO NOT USE
title: Borderline fraudulent

review:
I had been thinking about buying some crypto for a while now and decided on Coinbase as a lot of reviews had said how easy it was to use. 
It‚Äôs really straight forward to set up and start buying crypto. I haven‚Äôt cashed out yet but that looks easy as well. 
Only downside are the high fees but I‚Äôm ok with that for the time being.

Message for the Developer: Since the latest software update, the ‚ÄúGet Coinbase Wallet‚Äù ad  keeps coming on every time I press anything. Whereas before the update it would only show itself on log in. I can still do what I need to do but need to keep closing the ad.
title: Easy to Use

review:
This apps a joke. Really difficult to use hidden fees everywhere. They then say it will be 3 days to confirm your account. Then further log ins to actually withdraw your money. Weeks later still nothing ‚Äòverified‚Äô still no cash out. 6 months now - sent them over ¬£50 to ‚Äòvalidate‚Äô my account. Still not done still no way of getting your money out. It‚Äôs a scam - beware.

review: I‚Äôm a complete novice and was drawn to Coinbase from what was probably an Instagram scam (a sam I managed to avoid falling into). But having done some research, I find that Coinbase itself is legit. It makes buy - and selling - of cryptocurrency very easy. I emphasise the selling because I‚Äôve seen a few reviewers say its‚Äôs not possible. Not true. Set up a PayPall account and selling your crypto is possible and again very easy. I‚Äôve got a lot to learn about crypto and I won‚Äôt be rushing in with large amounts of cash but the Coinbase route seems to be a pretty good way of getting started.

review: Been using coinbase for some time now and only had slight problems ie verifying bank details and for the most part it‚Äôs ok BUT if you want to trade you‚Äôve next to no chance as the charges take 80% of your profit so I bought ¬£50 of loopring they charged me 1.99 it went up 25% ish so I wanted to sell them but again after a drop this wouldn‚Äôt have meant a further ¬£3.98 making I pointless after the sale I‚Äôd have made ¬£1 ish. review: They just charge you for every little thing, and don‚Äôt warn you that you need to verify your bank account by sending them an international transfer - normally this wouldn‚Äôt be a giant issue, but being from the UK, some banks charge up to ¬£25, just to send ‚Ç¨0.01... shambles. Genuinely, this app is simple for buying bitcoin, but useless for selling it. Do yourself a favour and use and online market, not an app like this - they just steal your money every time you try to do anything. I found t better to transfer my bitcoin to a different wallet that I have with another website and sell it on a bitcoin exchange because trying to withdraw directly to your bank account on this is so hopeless. Very slow transaction rate when transferring bitcoin to different wallets also, which is not good as the value can change so much in such a short time.

review:
After having my funds emptied from my Coinbase account (Coinbase are still looking into this)  Coinbase support advised me on some further security options. They recommended A security key, providing a hyperlink link to the Yubikey. So I purchased two as advised. Then tried to register the keys only to find that The Coinbase App isn‚Äôt compatible with such keys so now have to use the web browser only. So don‚Äôt they trust their own App?

Note: Coinbase doesn‚Äôt offer 24/7 support and so simply are not likely to be there to help when your account is hacked. You can send them a message that they‚Äôll look at when back in the office. 

Support links can feel awkward, you can‚Äôt Just message them, and if your issue doesn‚Äôt quite fit their drop down options it‚Äôs really hard to make contact. 

Responses from their support team are sporadic and at times they just go quiet and don‚Äôt respond. 

(For info I have never had any other account hacked and subscribe to a range of monitoring organisations that still flag no issues with either email accounts or phone numbers being stolen, or misused. To date Coinbase remains unique in being an issue for me.)
title: Security issues with app

review:
Coinbase allowed me to trf money in and convert to Bitcoin when I set up my account, but won‚Äôt allow me to move or convert funds. I contacted them once and followed up a few days later and was told not to contact them again as they are busy. For me, the money with them is making a loss as it‚Äôs in Bitcoin and I can‚Äôt convert it. 

I‚Äôve looked at other reviews and this seems to be a constant theme with Coinbase. Strangely the reviews are given 5 stars but if you read the reviews you can see this is not what the reviewer intended. So this is odd too.

Binance reviewed and verified my account in 2 days.
title: Joined 3 weeks ago and can‚Äôt access my money

review: Coinbase app is beautifully laid out and so easy to use. What is particularly easy is to deposit money. Withdrawals, however, are IMPOSSIBLE. review:

so you are on your own here. Tread carefully.

review: The app's seamless integration with the web platform allows for easy account management and real-time tracking of market changes. Additionally, Coinbase's commitment to regulatory compliance and transparent operations adds a layer of trust for users. While fees and availability may vary by region and transaction type, Coinbase's app remains a top choice for those seeking a reliable and accessible way to engage with the cryptocurrency market. For the most current information and user reviews, I recommend checking the latest sources or reviews for the Coinbase app.

review: It was a little bit difficult understanding how the app, and more importantly the transfer of funds and purchasing worked, but now that I have carried out a couple of transactions I am really beginning to enjoy using Coinbase. All my queries were answered, some quickly others no so but I got there in the end. A bit of a learning curve but fun all the same! Keep it up guys.

review:
If you‚Äôre using a half decent VPN the in app browser breaks, getting stuck in loops of human verification. I can‚Äôt link my PayPal due to these in app browser issues. Same problem using coinbase in my phones browser. Can‚Äôt even get through to the page to close my account. Who would have thought people interested in crypto are also interested in privacy‚Ä¶ and yet a basic VPN breaks all functionality!
There is little point using a VPN for privacy if you have to turn it off ‚Äútemporarily‚Äù to use some apps. But I did disable my VPN to move all of my crypto out of coinbase and obviously the app worked flawlessly when it was able to harvest all my personal data unencumbered by my VPN.

review: Once had high hopes for Coinbase but was let down badly vet quickly . 1700 Crypto tokens missing and they totally ignored all attempts to help me . Reported to financial ombudsman & financial service authority. Still waiting for Coinbase after 7 months! And many emails and tickets reported. There is no phone number to call and they have NO CUSTOMER SERVICE AT ALL. If something goes wrong your on your own with NO help . Be warned! title: Awful customer service.

review:
Pretty good but needs to have more available information such as price alerts which can be customised by the user, and the ability to preset trades at certain prices, both of which are unavailable. 
The main problem is that the customer service is awful. 
I‚Äôve contacted support three times using the drop-down menu options but have received no reply at all, meaning I am unable to verify my bank account in order to withdraw funds. 
The bank details Coinbase gives are not verifiable by my bank (Barclays) and so I currently can only put money in, but not take it back out again. 
Happy to change my review if this is resolved, but for now I would advise using a different app like Binance.
title: Pretty good

review:
There are far better options available. In fact I would choose any other app but this. All transactions are expensive in comparison to other trade platforms and the customer service is non existent. On a number of occasions transactions have
 been held in clearing for a number of days costing me money. You have to jump through a ridiculous amount of hoops. I‚Äôm my opinion it‚Äôs a way of holding your funds for a greater time leading to more transactions and more fees. Extremely poor app and service. As soon as this final payment clears I am deleting. Utter garbage. It irritates me I have to give this 1 star to leave a review. As ever read the recent reviews first rather than the most helpful. It gives a better indication of their recent performance.
title: Expensive and unresponsive

review:
Do not use this app it‚Äôs just an easy way for them to scam you out of your money, it starts off with you depositing your money, this is the only easy part of this process, because when you try to take the money out that‚Äôs where you will struggle. 

After reading other reviews it appears you will have to go through so much hassle to actually receive YOUR own money back! You will end up spending more money and more time just to get back the money which you should be able to get back instantly. Also I found it ridiculous that is fine to deposit from a normal bank card but if you want your money back well all off a sudden a bank won‚Äôt do!

Save yourself he stress, money and time and don‚Äôt wast your money on these scam artists
title: DO NOT USE THIS APP

review:
App itself is intuitive to use and user friendly...HOWEVER when it comes to verifying your accounts and withdrawing money it‚Äôs a borderline scam. Security is tight which I appreciate but you have to verify with a valid photo ID which takes days to register and is nuts when dealing with a valid U.K. debit/credit card and bank accnt. 

Every transaction charges ‚Äòadmin‚Äô fees and before you can withdraw funds you have to make an international payment to Estonia in order to verify your bank account for which some U.K. banks charge additional fees (could end up being ¬£15 depending on your bank). This takes 3-4 days to process as does any withdrawal after this, so receiving any money back on your investments can potentially take weeks, hurdles you certainly don‚Äôt have to cross when depositing money in the first place. 

It‚Äôs only a matter of time before a better platform arrives that treats customers with respect, provides actual customer service and is transparent about transaction fees.

Until then, steer well clear of Coinbase!

Frankly I‚Äôm baffled that it has a 5* rating on the AppStore clearly there are some bots at work here.
title: Read the Smallprint!!!

review: Been on Coinbase for about 2 months, have a bought and sold and traded about ¬£250 worth in that time. Have been charged sometimes up to ¬£10 a transaction even though it states I will not be charged a penny to do that. When I wanted to withdraw funds it simply states ‚Ä¶. Cannot withdraw to that account. God knows why. There‚Äôs obviously no one to call or speak to and after sending emails asking why‚Ä¶ no body has got back to me, not a total shock really. It‚Äôs just a massive con and will take whatever funds you sadly deposit in here. Do yourself a favour and put the money in a betting account instead, at least you have a chance and can withdraw your money if you decide to. Poor service Coinbase

review: It has a big problem were it says get crypto rewards for free, it won‚Äôt let you just says having problems connecting now not sure if it‚Äôs just me but what‚Äôs the point of having it there if it don‚Äôt work, side note Coinbase is good maked a few Thousand pounds from dec2020 to March2021 (today) don‚Äôt expect money to come for free or to make money over night u can‚Äôt just buy some and expect it to be worth more at all, u gotta know what your doing. title: Good I guess...

review:
You will be lucky to come away from using this app just feeling disappointed and poverty. Most feel incensed and scammed. Check the Trustpilot reviews over what you see here.

Basically, there is a very high chance that you will be one of the hundreds of thousands of random users that will be locked out of your account because of a review that never finishes or because they‚Äôve lost all your funds and don‚Äôt want to bother telling you.

There is no actual support or contact for them when this does happen. None whatsoever. There is a place you can send an email to, but you will not get a reply. There is a complaints page that leads to the same email, but you will not get a reply. There used to be a phone number you could call, but they successfully got rid of that years ago. There are thousands of Reddit posts ready for you to read that will tell you the same thing. 

If I could give -5 stars, it would still be too much. The most abhorrent and reprehensible company I have ever known. Stay away at all costs.
title: An absolute trainwreck. Avoid like face herpes.

review:
Ok so the platform is easy to use, has an excellent UI and I‚Äôve had no issues with verification or limits. It doesn‚Äôt have order books or advanced chart features, but is aimed at retail investors as opposed to sophisticated.

The problem I have with Coinbase are the hidden fees. Buying ETH today priced at ~1690, once the spread, liquidity, the buy fee and the debit card fee are taken into account I paid ~1780. Also worth noting that the majority of the cost comes from the debit card fee, and in the UK this is currently the only way to buy on Coinbase.

Even if you‚Äôre planning to hold longterm this platform simply isn‚Äôt worth it. More transparency re the true cost of purchase is required and I‚Äôll be, migrating to Binance and complaining to the FCA.
title: High Fees

review:
Really user friendly app. Just two minor points which drops it to 4 stars. 
Firstly the fees are higher than other crypto apps. That‚Äôs acceptable as I find Binance etc much more difficult to navigate so I‚Äôll stay with Coinbase for now. The second negative is the layout change recently. There used to be all the latest crypto news if you scrolled down the main page. Now that‚Äôs changed to info on various tokens that they‚Äôre trying to flog you. Change the page back again please!!!

review: This is the worst way to buy and sell BTC if you have a uk bank account. The process to add money to your account is nice and easy (quelle surprise) however, when you try to withdraw your funds, the process becomes ridiculously complicated, and you are penalised with so many charges that any profit made on your coins becomes lost during the transfer. You cannot transfer directly to a U.K. Bank account, it has to be done via a sepa transfer in euros which is a nightmare. I'd never recommend this app to anyone, ever. I have approximately ¬£400 stuck there!! Unbelievable. Furthermore, when you try to contact Coinbase for assistance their method is either a bot system, or an email that you never receive a response to. Avoid this app at all costs.
title: Terrible, simply terrible.

review:
I‚Äôve been using them without a hitch for 2 years then out of the blue , your account has been restricted! No warning, 21 days to sort . All during Bitcoins biggest ever rally and 2 weeks before they float on the stock market !! Great exchange that doesn‚Äôt give a monkeys about customer support despite their claims and excuses ... lost a small fortune .. not happy ! Shocking lack of Service !!
Update after a month new sople took i e I was given ¬£150 for my troubles and an apology! Bliss!!

review:
It is imperative that you are aware of your legal rights before engaging with any individuals or organizations. Failure to do so could result in being taken advantage of, as I myself narrowly escaped such a situation.

In my experience, these individuals or organizations may attempt to take advantage of unsuspecting victims in order to gain financial benefit. I was fortunate enough to have access to external legal counsel, who were able to assist me in recovering my funds before any further damage could be done. 

I strongly recommend you to exercise caution and be vigilant at all times. Please take this warning seriously, and ensure that you are fully informed and equipped with the necessary legal knowledge and support before engaging with any services or individuals.
title: Caution: shady

review: I have been using this app nearly a year and recently all my funds disappeared.  No trace, no transaction, no ledger.  After writing for support I was instructed they would put a hold on my account until they looked into it.  Looking into though for them was asking me where my funds went and asking me how this could have happened.  They finally have agreed to give me my original funds back with no explanation as to why this happened.  Unfortunately after they have agreed to refunding the funds they have locked me out of my account and have started the entire conversation from scratch, so daft is understatement.  This company could not give 2 cents about customer support.
title: Daft is an understatement

review: Coinbase were happy to let me deposit fiat and buy crypto straight away, but then almost straight away my account was under review meaning i could not withdraw or trade my currency. From other comments i can see the review can take months and months. After raising a ticket i was told my account would be expedited, i waited a week and i was still unable to use coinbase. I then raised a complaint, after over 3 weeks since opening my account  I received confirmation that the review was complete. I have taken my crpto to another exchange as i no longer trust coinbase. It‚Äôs a shame as coinbase is really easy to use and has a really nice and simple interface for  beginners.
title: Took 3-4 weeks to verify

review:
Coinbase for some reason put my account under review for almost a month now (despite being verified already). During this time I am unable to make any changes to my portfolio and I am forced to remain invested in the assets i was invested in prior to the review and hence i am losing money without being able to do anything about it.
Their support is non-responsive ofcourse and looking at online reviews this practice seems to be quite common, they seem to rely on people giving up and letting them get away with their money.
Leaving the review here to help others avoid this situation by never using this app, will take legal action as well
title: Thousands of pounds frozen in my account, support is silent

review:
As per title, fees are excessive on EVERYTHING you do, using fiat to buy crypto they take a nice massive fee (compared to others), they also take a 2nd fee on the exact same transaction but giving you a lower rate than what you buy/sell.

Buy SOL at ¬£9.00? Expect them to sell it to you at a buy in price of ¬£9.38 ontop of the initial charge already. Exchanging crypto 1 for another? Excessive fees again. Whatever you do, you‚Äôre getting stung by the largest fees on any platform/exchange.

Credit where it‚Äôs due, it‚Äôs simple, noob friendly, and easy to use, but they‚Äôre greedy
title: Simple for noobs, VERY high fees - reason for 3 stars

review:

title: My Experience - Great App

review:

Overall, as a UK user, I have not experienced any problems purely specific to ‚ÄòCoinbase‚Äô.

title: Coinbase

review:
I don‚Äôt understand coinbase‚Ä¶ they want to be taken seriously.. but their customer support is shocking

If you want support you go to their support site - there are links everywhere to ‚Äúcontact us‚Äù but they just take you to the support home page. There is a menu to get in touch but each click limits you to specific options and there is no way to send an enquiry on something that isn‚Äôt on their very limited list

So you get past that barrier and manage to send them an email. All you get are automated responses of generic text. I am on my 5th reply and yet to get anything specific to me and just get boilerplate 

There are plenty of other places to buy crypto (with often much less fees)‚Ä¶ I‚Äôd pay coinbases fees if I thought I was getting decent support but it‚Äôs the opposite 

Coinbase will go downhill and there‚Äôll be all sorts of introspection as to what happened to the market etc. But basic customer service isn‚Äôt rocket science yet is completely lacking and I am taking my business elsewhere

review: Have found coinbase easy for trading but be very careful sending funds by email! I sent funds by email to my trader he was unable to open it! title: Hard to contact

review:
Their systems go down EVERY time there is a dip in the market, so payments fail. They then lock your account saying you owe them money and if they don‚Äôt get it within 5 days they will start selling your crypto as payment.
Transferred the amount owed from my bank to coinbase and then it said I am unable to use my GBP wallet to pay.
Now the due payment has disappeared entirely but my account is still locked and they are going to sell all my crypto.
Their customer support simply ignore you and just close cases without even responding. 
Avoid this exchange like the plague. Poor infrastructure, even poorer customer support, your crypto and money is NOT safe with them.
title: Worst customer support, sells your crypto

review:
The platform locks users out when there‚Äôs a price rush or drop. Users should have full autonomy over their wallets & Coinbase is regulating access according to the market movements is unacceptable.

Also, payout to UK banks is challenging. Coinbase doesn‚Äôt accept payment from my bank, Nationwide and it requires you to make a $1 payment before withdrawal can be initiated. As a workaround, I set up a Revolut a/c within 5 mins. Loaded that account from nationwide; paid coinbase and within two days had received payment of my coinbase assets into my Revolut euro account which I can now convert into GBP at the best FX rate and without added fees. I won‚Äôt use coinbase again since they control the market & make extraction from their wallets difficult.
title: Controlling the market

title: Taken money twice and don‚Äôt care

review:
Just a piece of advice for everyone!
1. If you sending money from a non supported financial institution, in theory the money will be rejected and refunded. As I didn‚Äôt know that my financial institution is not supported, I sent the money. Over 1 month later, still no money! I mean it is not returned and not credited! Disappeared!
2. Customer service non existent! I created four cases regarding the issue with the deposit. They delete the case without replying. I mean they make the case disappear from my account!
3. When the market suddenly fluctuate they block transactions. You can‚Äôt sell and buy, therefore missing out on opportunities to make money. 
4. I spoke with people who actually managed to register their bank account, yet the withdrawal process is long (weeks) and painful!
Therefore I regret trying my luck with this company. If you reading this review, make sure you consider this before investing any money & keep in mind if something looks too good be true, probably is!
title: Not trustworthy!

review:
I don't know what all the bad reviews are about!

I deposited ¬£100 via Debit Card, the %charge was a bit high but it worked fine. Bought some Eth/Btc no problem. Went to sell and withdraw and it required me to set up and verify a bank account via SEPA. So I did this with a ‚Ç¨6 transfer, 2 days later, done! 

I can now transfer money back and forth (free/‚Ç¨0.15 charge) into my coinbase wallet with a delay of about 2 days.

I have made multiple withdrawals to my bank since, no problem.

I haven't had a error due to too many people investing when the price drops like other people have said, maybe I've just been lucky!

My UK bank is Barclays, they have no SEPA charges when done online or via the mobile app. 

Live prices would be a great improvement!
title: Works perfect! Charges are a bit high but can be avoided

review:
As a user since 2017 I‚Äôm amazed by all the updates‚Ä¶ with every single update the app is getting worse, it‚Äôs less legible, the charts are narrowed, information about whole market disappeared, information about coin disappeared‚Ä¶ seems like they‚Äôre doing everything to alienate users, limit information and in the end lost the clients.

Whoever is behind those updates will burn in hell üëπ
title: User since 2017

review:
- ID all cleared at the beginning and I could trade just fine 
- suddenly my account needed verification and it has taken them four months so far, I still have no access to my money and I have contacted ‚Äúsupport‚Äù over ten times 
- every time I got an automated generic response nothing to do with what I reported 
- no phone number or responsive support team, just automated messages 
- one employee over email refused to speak on the phone and said this is not a service we provide so if like me customer service is a priority avoid avoid avoid
title: Avoid avoid avoid

review: Other drawbacks are that the screen does not  auto-rotate and that there is no way to look back longitudinally at your positions and purchases.  I find this particularly irksome as  it makes it difficult to tell if see where I am in relation to where I started.  The free crypto is a nice touch but the commission(5.6%) makes me want to try a different wallet. (I am new to this so maybe a wallet like this is designed for the nubes.....)
title: Decent App, easy to use but high fees

review: Great app and perfect for easy intro to buying and owning crypto.  Now they seemed to have fixed the 3D secure verification can actually buy from the app now which is great, would get cancelled by Coinbase before after purchase.  Would still recommend doing euro wire transfer to Coinbase though to reduce fees when purchasing.  Only negative is they need more types of crypto coins to be able to purchase.
title: Awesome app

review: What Coinbase don‚Äôt tell you when you are invited to use them is that you need to use convoluted payment techniques to get your money out which involve you having to take unnecessary bank changes. They took my GBP but forced me to make an additional EUR international payment of EUR5 (plus bank fee of ¬£9.50) to them before they would be prepared to email me MY money - which was on top of the fees they took for all transactions and for withdrawal. Plus they are not regulated and you have no recourse - something I learned after calling their number. PLEASE AVOID THESE IF YOU WANT TO DO BUSINESS WITH HONEST COMPANIES.
title: Unfortunately VERY dodgy (do not ignore this warning!)

review: At first you think Of paypal when you use it for a couple of minutes, very nice and friendly environment with an easy and fast way of purchasing coins however as you go deeper and deeper you would start to see some hidden costs and charges that are absolute rip offs. Unbelievably costly to work with these guys. Developers and founders of this should be arrested. Rootless thieves.
title: Absolute Trash

review:
Utterly the most disgusting crypto experience you can imagine! I spent over a month and countless hours on the support chat trying to recover a missing transaction. They only refunded me after I submitted official complaint. The support is USELESS. 

After all that yesterday the app logged me out and then keeps giving me errors when I try to log back in! I logged on on my tablet using the same app really but on the phone it keeps showing me an error‚Ä¶

Avoid on all cost if you can find the coins you are after elsewhere!!!
title: The most idiotic crypto exchange

review: I honestly do not recommend this app, this is honestly the worst I have EVER come accross. From their absolutely diabolical verification system which takes weeks, do not log out the app because if you do you will never be able to access it again unless your on a computer. There is no customer support what so ever. Just do yourself a favour, if your going to trade Bitcoin just use Binance. They are far better, more helpful and are always there for support if you need it, unlike Coinbase which quite frankly are absolutely sh**

review: I got this app almost a month ago, and have still not been able to get started yet. For some reason it took my location and nationality as Turkish. I am British. However because it INCORRECTLY registered me as Turkish, I cannot verify my account because I need to ‚Äúupload photo ID from country of origin‚Äù. So I did‚Ä¶ I uploaded my UK Driving license. It rejected me and said to upload ID from country of origin! AAARRGGHH!! I AM NOT TURKISH SO I CANNOT UPLOAD TURKISH ID !! It seems I cannot get around this now after trying for nearly a month so I will to go elsewhere for my wallet/exchange!
title: Terrible, shoddy, frustrating!
developerResponse: {'id': 29198787, 'body': 'Hi Speng316, this isn‚Äôt the experience we want you to have and we thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We‚Äôll be sure to share this information with our teams to help us to improve in the future.', 'modified': '2022-04-15T20:04:26Z'}

review:
Joined coin base about 2 weeks ago. 
Overall the app is good but 

Portfolio balance is a work of fiction.  Totalling my assets is significantly lower than my reported Portfolio Balance. This is a long standing issue which seems to stem from the portfolio balance possibly being shown in USD (even though it states in my case GBP) 

However, after a week this has miraculously fixed itself and today the figure is at last reported correctly. 

Would love a ‚Äúnet growth / loss‚Äù view by investment and total portfolio that accounts for trading balance - costs incurred  (e.g. transaction costs) . It may be in the premium version. 

¬£2.99 transaction fee is high. 

Otherwise pretty good, but I can‚Äôt believe the balance mis-reporting is fundamental
title: Some really annoying errors,  but generally good

review:
Very disappointing service, after lengthy time to get verification I annoy add payment method and after dozens of emails and nearly a month now they emailed me your case is now closed without solving the issue or giving the curtesy to tell me what was the problem or to try to solve it. Very disappointing 
Would strongly recommend to try another play form would only imagine if your money is within coinbase and needed help will be trapped for every. So for for my own experience the worst plat form ever, would give zero star if it was an option
title: Avoid avoid avoid

review: I actually love Coinbase and am happy to pay slightly higher fees that other exchanges to use it. But the app is too lean. There are BASIC features that the app should have to enhance the trading/investing experience. E.g. custom Price Tickers. Also it would be great if the price of the coin could also be on the portfolio screen so I don‚Äôt have to open each one to see.
title: Big fan - but needs improvements

review:
As if it wasn‚Äôt bad enough that they take 4% just to send money to the Coinbase wallet, they charge a fee of about ¬£15 each time you buy or sell. Then they charge another fee to withdraw your own money. But because the money is withdrawn in Euros (and I‚Äôm in the UK) there‚Äôs another 4 or 5% taken from the amount you withdraw, meaning that the actual amount that finally gets deposited into your bank account is a fraction of what you originally invested (even if you make a profit you‚Äôll probably lose it in fees like I did).

Someone somewhere is getting seriously rich off ripping people off with fees
title: Fee fees and more fees

review: First I heard about coinbase was from a friend who has been dealing with bitcoin. I saw the interface and it was very intuitive and easy to use. I as non technical person can use it without any issue I think anyone can. Thanks for making world of crypto very simple and easy for everyone. Great app indeed
title: Coinbase a great crypto platform

review: People give Coinbase bad rep because they don‚Äôt understand the level of difficulty of what they are trying to achieve. However, it‚Äôs not the most dynamic exchange out there nor the fastest or least glitchy but and it‚Äôs a big but.. it‚Äôs the most accessible. And for that you have to give em credit.
title: I understand what they are trying to achieve is ambitious

review:
In order to transfer crypto from your coinbase account to the coinbase wallet it asks you for a second factor authentication  which is sent via txt, however it sends you a 7 digit number to fulfill a 6 digit number.
Obviously it will always fail.
There is always something with coinbase.
A few years ago when bitcoin reach 20k I've tried to sell what I had however the platform kept me our saying that was having too much traffic meaning that I couldn't sell at the top at the time.
Really hope that works better in the US

title: 100% genuine, but‚Ä¶

review:
If you read other reviews and skip the supposed ‚Äú4.6/5‚Äù rating on here, you will see that Coinbase is famous for restricting your account and controlling your money as they please WITHOUT EVER GIVING ANY EXPLANATIONS.

Tried to buy the profitable dip in cryptocurrency in this app and my payments have been rejected twice for unclear reasons. Lost out on opportunities and never got an explanation why they rejected my payments when I asked them about it. However, when buying at average crypto rates, there doesn‚Äôt seem to be an issue.

In the recent crypto market crash, they blocked all my payment methods to keep me from buying any crypto. When I contacted them about it, they ignored my question and told me that I am now not allowed to make any purchases (no explanation as to why) but offered to sell all my crypto (while it is obviously a loss for me to do so).

Avoid these jokers.
title: Avoid altogether

review:
Great app for looking at pretty charts. 

Easy to upload a debit card to deposit money.

But when you make a bit of profit and try to withdraw IT IS A NIGHTMARE! You cannot simply withdraw into the same account as you deposited! You have to verify your account by sending them more money via A SEPA payment! ¬£25 charge with your bank, and they want this done twice! It takes nearly ¬£60 to get money out and even at that mine still isn‚Äôt verified.

They have no customer support, their uk base is an empty building, no phone number, no one to contact, just a pile of hassle and stress. 

Never ever use this app! Complete scam! Unable to withdraw funds! Basically taken my money and kept it! Wasted ¬£80 trying to sort. Eventually had to buy coins with my remaining money and send/ sell to a friend to get rid of it!

Do not fall into the trap! Research Coinbase problems on google first! Learn from my mistake!
title: Please read prior to downloading!

review: I've had problems with Coinbase from the beginning. It's cost me a ton of money due to faults when I first tried to use it and stupid buying limits which you can only expand slightly over time which doesn't help when they price of bitcoin is rapidly going up. Now I'm on a limit of ¬£24 a day which is ridiculous. It's an app that everyone should have who wants to trade in bitcoin but can't be used to buy in bulk (by bulk I mean more than ¬£340 a week). Download it for the charts, etc but don't rely on it to buy. Hopefully it will improve with time.
title: Ok but don't waste you time if you want to buy in bulk

review:
I‚Äôve been uninformed Coinbase for nearly 3 years now. Without notice the account was restricted for no reason with thousands of pounds in it leaving me unable to access my funds.

Zero communication from Coinbase despite opening ticket after ticket with them, it‚Äôs been 2 months now and they still haven‚Äôt got back to me other than the automated response saying they are extremely busy at the moment and the ticket will be dealt with shortly.

I wouldn‚Äôt recommend Coinbase and I have now switched to another platform.
title: Zero customer service

review:
This is a great place to enter and start investing.
Very simplistic in allowing you to understand how to  trade in the  world of crypto currency and transferring fiat currency to crypto currency.

This platform gives you a breakdown of what each coin does, what other coins it‚Äôs related to and current news that influences the rise and fall of its value.

It covers all coins, even if it‚Äôs not available for trading on this platform and gives you leads by supplying the all important ticker.

Good place to start as a novice and gives you a sense of security with setting up an account and it‚Äôs wallet.

You can also earn from tutorials and investing into coins which give you rewards for coins.
title: Number 1 start up platform

review:
Went to coin base on a recommendation from someone I know who trades for a living.  Didn‚Äôt read the reviews as he knows the Bitcoin and shares market better than I could ever hope to.  

Well from the get go it‚Äôs a total failure can‚Äôt even get the registration emails. They are not being blocked as the junk filter on my account is set to training mode and only blocks when I tell it to.    So currently I can‚Äôt buy or sell or anything. Looks like all the app is doing is taking up space on my phone. So I will be exploring other options for my investment cash.

review: Coinbase has made buying and selling crypto simple. With all the essential features included along with one of my favourite features the earn rewards. I‚Äôm hoping my account will be unlocked but going by some people‚Äôs experiences I would be lucky. Customer Service said there‚Äôs nothing they could do and asked me not to follow up on my inquiry because that would only add burden to their system. No one gave any time estimates as to when the freeze will be lifted. Checked online and this has happened to many others that got their accounts locked up for months.
title: Account frozen & cannot trade

review: I like the idea of this app. However I feel you pay a lot on every sale or trade which is a bit disappointing if you have made ¬£5 to then give that ¬£5 back once you‚Äôve made it on a sale. I think they need to drop their prices slightly. It‚Äôs very transparent. When you do put in a ticket it takes a while to come back. title: Good but a bit pricey.

review:
The app‚Äô design is well thought out and easy to navigate. Information, market pricing and graphs are all easy to understand. 

Unfortunately the back end and customer service aren‚Äôt even remotely up to scratch. They‚Äôve had years to fix this and the same old problems occur again and again. I‚Äôve lost  several thousand pounds recently not being able to trade due to platform/app‚Äô problems.

Please do your research on ongoing the Coinbase platform issues before jumping in with both feet!
title: Cashed out and moved to another exchange.

review: Everything about coinbase is perfect but it has been 2 year since i am using coinbase i can‚Äôt deposit money into my account i asked the coinbase hell center they told me this is automated and there is nothing they could to fix even though i was ready to provide any information such as brb video of my eelf or passport even my address

Purchased tokens that I was charged nearly double the price for and Coinbase refuse to investigate and say that prices can fluctuate at purchase.  Apparently it doubled in price for the 20 seconds it took me to make the purchase and then went back to normal.

Funny thing is that the price I was charged per token, was higher than it had been at any time during the previous month period, yet they still fail to accept that it had charged wrong.
title: Will charge double on some tokens

review:

review:
I made my account yesterday, verified my identity with passport and drivers licence, and made a deposit.  I was then told they need to review my account.  Fair enough, but the scam is that they insist on hanging onto your money, the withdraw option is not accessible whilst the account is under review.  A quick google search beings up hundreds in the same situation, check Twitter, Reddit, etc, some have been waiting months, without any response from Coinbase.  I have discovered first hand there is zero customer service, there isn‚Äôt even a phone number.

TL;DR: AVOID Coinbase and this app like the plague
title: New customers BEWARE

review: Coinbase is the worst app to trust when you are investing in crypto. I did this and two days later I can withdraw, which is great, but it shouldn‚Äôt be that tricky.

review:
The app asks me to re-sign in about once a week, requiring 3 verification steps. During this time, my not insignificant investments are unavailable to me.

The portfolio view doesn‚Äôt show you the percentage change given your average investment into particular coins, meaning you need to click in to see past transaction and figure it out for yourself.

The market view shows you ‚Äúwinners, losers and tradeable‚Äù, but doesn‚Äôt let you select ‚Äútradeable winners‚Äù or ‚Äútradeable losers‚Äù meaning I keep seeing options for amazing coins I can‚Äôt buy.
title: Bad UX, worrying security

review:
Working in tech I was intrigued by the crypto space and thought that I should at least use it once to get an idea of how it worked.
Given that crypto is supposed to be part of the tech future the fact that they cannot even deliver an app that can sign you up flawlessly should tell you everything you need to know.
Repeatedly asking for photo ID to be submitted, app that doesn‚Äôt display properly...these are basic things that a school kid would get right.
This is the kind of app that confirms the worst fears that people have of the crypto world. 
Avoid. Avoid. Avoid.
title: Laughably bad!

If only eToros minimum purchase price was a bit lower, their customer service is brill. I‚Äôm gunna go see if Binance care more about customer their customers. Buh bye!

P.S. If you‚Äôre going to tell people you will give them currency for watching a vid - to actually get given it would be nice!

review:
A very slick app. Easy to use and buy currency. Great at tracking your profit/loss.
As the most popular exchange it is prone to the occasional crash when the Bitcoin world has a frenzy(the $10k moment for example). Recommending app if you understand that...
YOU WILL NOT BE ABLE TO DIRECTLY WITHDRAW FUNDS TO A U.K. BANK 

The app asks you to deposit funds via a sepa transfer(¬£10 charge from your bank to do this) so it can then verify your account. Like countless others I tried this but no joy. Don't do this!

To withdraw you'll need to log on to coinbase via a p.c , and send your coin the address of another wallet/exchange account you have setup(I used bitpanda who charged ¬£1 for the privilege) . Make sure it's one that has sepa transfers properly setup- test first !

review:
I have been a Coinbase user since 2017 and I have noticed an anomaly that happens whenever the price of any cryptocurrency drops significantly within a short period of time - the app completely stops functioning and all purchased are not permitted with an 502 error. 

As such, it is to my belief that Coinbase cannot handle these cheap prices and deliberately halt all purchase on the app until the price somewhat stabilises.

The customer service is simply the worst I have ever experienced. 

Use Crytopay instead, it‚Äôs easy to withdraw funds in the form of gift cards or cash, and the customer service is lightyears ahead of Coinbase

Overall I wouldn‚Äôt recommend using this exchange, because everyone should have the right to control over their fund without them being seized.

review: Since I first started to use Coinbase . I have been stopped from taking advantage of the changing market. Whenever I want to take profit or buy into various coins my account has been blocked or temporarily disabled due to either KYC (which can take months to review) or because there is some problem with security. Security is a problem at Coinbase causing them to block and disable accounts for months at a time. I think they must be getting constant attacks so need to lock down our accounts. During these times you are not allowed access to your funds or to look to see if your BTC or ETH has been taken after they tell you there has been a security failure. The worry is intense because they say nothing and ask you to wait and wait. There is nobody to talk to and they do not accept emails or phone calls. I managed to change my password and verify my identity and address and report my account being temporarily disabled. Now when I need access more than ever before my account is Blocked. Most of the time my account is not accessible. I am having to use credit cards for air flights and holidays. The questions I‚Äôve been required to answer have had me going back to companies I worked for and left over 50 years ago to speak to the HR Departments and ask them for documentation. Every bank statement and letters from my mother. It really is insanity because once I‚Äôm clear they ask for the same things all over again. It‚Äôs a roundabout of questions never ever ending. They are so paranoid about being caught out doing something wrong. It makes me wonder what they are up to. I rate it as I do because I hope to keep this information here for you to consider if you want to go through this horror just to own a few Bitcoin.
title: Whenever there is movement the accounts are Blocked.

review: I set up an account on Coinbase back in January, was asked to upload photo ID which I did in the form of my driving license. After 1 month I was still waiting for verification. I sent an email to the support team, days later received an email saying the problem was resolved. It wasn‚Äôt. I logged in and clicked on a currency to be met with the he same awaiting verification page. I had enough at this point and was disappointed after hearing only good things about Coinbase. After another 2 months I came back to give it another chance to find it was still awaiting verification. I sent a further email to support again explaining the situation and that I had been told it was resolved a month earlier. I received an email back apologising and saying it would be looked into but they are busy so it may take a while. Then as if to ridicule me, days later I receive an email asking me to rate their support asking ‚Äúwas your issue resolved?‚Äù. Obviously not because they have sent me an email saying it will take longer and it still hasn‚Äôt been fixed. I apologise for the length of this and it‚Äôs the first review I‚Äôve left for an App. I just find it utterly shocking that it can take 4 months so far for a new account to be verified even when photo ID has been sent in. It doesn‚Äôt give me a good feeling about the app and makes me wonder what would happen once verified if I had a support issue involving finances, would it take the same amount of time to look into the that too? For now from my personal experience I can only say how disappointing my experience has been and advise other to look elsewhere for a more proactive company. Thanks for reading.

review:
My partner and me both coinbase customers  sent a large amount of crypto as an internal transfer within coinbase customer to customer should‚Äôve been very straight forward internal transfer account to account , crypto sent but not received it‚Äôs impossible to go missing as it is an internal coinbase transfer not like we used an external wallet. Got in touch with support 
Been going back and forth with support who are not denying or agreeing funds are missing it‚Äôs purely an internal problem within coinbase we sent to the correct account and have and kept proof with correct details showing they've asked for this we sent it to them a number of times still they are dragging this on loads of emails sent back and forth they know there‚Äôs some kind of glitch which took place yet still not really wanting to return the large Amount of coins and it is purely a internal coinbase issue no customer issue here at all still shockingly something which should be straight forward they‚Äôre trying to complicate it and don‚Äôt really want to admit wrong and return funds by the looks of things no real support whatsoever they just make sure they reply back in time to make it look like they‚Äôre doing something and cover their backs this has gone on ages now they keep sending copy and pasted messages but they‚Äôre not  saying the coins are lost or where they are either because it‚Äôs an internal transaction within coinbase so they can‚Äôt be anywhere else they know this but don't want to return a large amount of coins maybe lost within their system somewhere really shocked by this level of extremely poor service I‚Äôve got proof with mine and an internal transfer I feel sorry for anyone who this happens to and it‚Äôs an external wallet they will have zero support in my opinion.
We joined coinbase thinking it was one of the safest platforms to use, had this been our own error we could accept that but an internal problem within coinbase I don‚Äôt feel we should be out of pocket as a result they maybe hoping we just get tired and give up with this pursuit but what‚Äôs right is right it‚Äôs hard earned money and a lot of it. SHOCKING!

review:
I had loads of problems when i first started using coinbase and to be honest my previous review was the same as many on here screaming its a scam its its not letting le withdraw and all the same negativity that is in some reviews but being a user of coinbase now for a good few years and watching coinbase grow and seeing the improvements its put in place and all the work its done i absolutely love coinbase..

Back when i started with coinbase it had Bad customer support no uk tel support emails not getting answered ohh the frustration BUT COINBASE HAS COME A LONG WAY IN THE LAST YEAR 

The dreaded verifying your bank account procedure once you get it done is then a doddle to withdraw.
I am a uk user of coinbase and i can say that yes they will verify your bank account eventually and once they do withdrawing your funds takes the standard bank time of within 2 hrs usually a lot faster..i find that bank deposit to and from my
Coinbase account from my uk bank usually happens within 30 mins..

Coinbase has come so far in the last year with now adding GBP support as well as uk phone support so no more dealing in euros and international payments also they have a uk number for customer support which you can ring any time (take the hint ANY TIME) i called it at about 1 am uk time once and got straight through to a really helpful woman who sorted my problem out...

Patients people coinbase is not a scam and once you get your bank verified then the hard bit is over...
It took me ages tho to verify my account but that was a few years ago when coinbase was not what it is now...coinbase really has come a long way and is currently (at the time of me Writing this) in the process of also enabling you to link a paypal account if you have one so you can deposit and withdraw to your linked paypal from coinbase and buy crypto with your paypal funds if your a user of a certain online auction selling your stuff to make money for me thats a big thumbs up to then buy crypto.

Enjoy peeps do your research and be patient...

Coinbase keeps getting better and I'm excited for what it has in its pipe lines next..

Also yes coinbase has fees its a business what do you expect..
SO Here is a little tip google coinbase pro and learn how to use it for buying and selling with no fees there is no coinbase pro app only internet browser tho
title: Coinbase has come a long way...i love it

review:
Coinbase is a user friendly place for beginners to buy and sell crypto and to get their head around the crypto scene.
BEWARE though, if a coin or token goes on a massive bull run (goes up a lot in value, very quickly) Coinbase WILL go down and you won‚Äôt be able to get your money or sell your token to get the benefit if it‚Äôs increased value.
This could be an infrastructure problem, to do with massive demand on the site, but experienced crypto hodlers who saw the recent coinbase IPO launch would argue that coinbase must have seen this demand coming, and for a multi billion dollar business, ‚Äòwe couldn‚Äôt cope with the demand‚Äô simply doesn‚Äôt wash.
In short, Coinbase will temporarily steal / freeze all of your money / assets in times of profit unless you know what you are doing.  And good luck trying to contact customer services by the way, coinbase stole ¬£5000 of my money for 6 months before quietly reinstating my account. I sent 15 emails and got absolutely nowhere and almost gave up on that money. Imagine how hopeless things must have seemed to walk away from ¬£5k. The financial regulator wasn‚Äôt interested.  Placing automated trades on the exchange will protect you a bit, but ultimately you never know when you will need to cash out, and you need to know that when you make that decision, you can access your tokens to sell them. In this respect coinbase lets its users down / swindles it‚Äôs less affluent users, so don‚Äôt keep your money on it. Buy your crypto then put it in another wallet, trezor or another offline / paper wallet. You can read more about this phenomenon on Reddit r/Coinbase.
title: Don‚Äôt keep your money on Exchanges

review:
Initially setup and depositing money in ¬£ amazing, transferring money or currency around the market to other wallets and back is also good. Selling and withdrawal of funds is nearly impossible, you have to sell any currency you have primarily in Euros unless you change it to GBP prior to pressing sell, this is easily missed. Once sold you have set up an international payment and I‚Äôm still waiting even though I‚Äôve received an email confirming my transfer of the 2 euro to prove the link for international withdrawal was successful. Through moving money about trying to get my cash back into my bank has cost me dearly, every time you do something Coinbase smack a charge on it, not small unnoticeable charges either. I have no doubt when I find out how to get my money out, maybe not through this app and wallet, they will hit me with another charge.
Another one to be aware of, banks charge you as well to set up the international payment.
The app is slow and does not reflect the exact market price 100 percent, when you press sell, by the time you have gone to the next page it will reflect the correct market price and will be potentially less than when you pressed sell, the app also has tendency‚Äôs to freeze when you press sell or not allow your transaction to go through due to errors. This has only happened to me, when prices have risen funnily enough. 
It‚Äôs a shame I have to give this app one star to review it, otherwise I‚Äôd give it minus five stars. Absolute muck about, only one winner here and it‚Äôs certainly not me. Zero customer service, apps like this should be removed and designers ejected from the planet.
